We learn

Together.By Doing.By Teaching.

THE CROSSROAD BETWEEN EDUCATION AND CONSULTANCY

A new way to do consultancy

About ShARE-UP

We are the University of Porto's branch of the international organization ShARE, a student association that gathers the top students, focusing on training them to develop innovative, professional solutions for startups, companies and NGOs.

For the Students

Work on real-world cases, with start-ups, NGOs, high-level companies. Become an exceptional leader and, most of all, learn and share your knowledge

For the Companies

Discover a new way to do consultancy. Tap into a global ecossystem of innovation, fueled by highly trained students that are passionate about learning and helping you grow

ShARE Students

ShARE-UP members are bright students, with the potential to shape a more sustainable and inclusive world

Do Well Do Good

Through excellence and professionalism, we collaborate on solving major societal issues and on cases to transform companies

Leadership

ShARE is structured to improve the studentsâ€™ ability to take initiatives and develop an entrepreneurial spirit

Global Mindset

Our members are integrated in a global network, enabling us to work with international teams to develop projects. The events we locally organize have a global impact

Knowledge Sharing

We promote discussion and critical thinking inside our organization. All our meetings and presentations are in English and we discuss many different topics

Consultancy Skills

ShARE students acquire top corporate skills through training and real life projects with start-ups, companies, and NGOs

ShARE Services

If you are a company, startup or NGO, work with our members to make you even better at it!

Networks

The rest of the members work in one of these 6 different networks

Energy
Industry
Business Strategy
Global Economics
ICT & Innovation
Mobility
Energy
Solar, Wind, Biomass, Renewable Energy, Global Agencies & International Policies, Nuclear, CO2 Emission, Grid, Transmission & Distribution, Coal Energy, Environment, Hydropower
Industry
Logistics & Supply Chain, Lean Management, Manufacturing Processes, Quality Management, Heavy Industry, Industrial Policies, Machinery, Infrastructure
Business Strategy
Marketing, Mergers & Acquisition , Human Resources , Strategy & Planning , Expansion, Organisation , Operational Effectiveness , Pricing
Global Economics
Poverty Lines & HDI, Agriculture & Development, Economic Growth, Inequality, Unemployment, Disability, Youth, Elders, Happiness, Social Business, Macroeconomic models, Macroeconomic Crisis, Public Economics, Education, Trade, Monetary Policies, Fiscal Policies, Globalization & Development, Microfinance, Health
ICT & Innovation
Telecom Networks, IT Industry , Software Industry , Internet Industry , Rural ICT, Social Networks, Telecom Vendors , Venture Capital & Innovation Funds , R&D Models , Social Entrepreneurship , Government Policies, Intellectual Property Rights, Entrepreneurs Sociology , Scientific Parks & Incubators , Universities
Mobility
Urban Logistics, Sustainable Logistics, Electric Mobility, Autonomous Driving, Public Transit, Mobility Policies, Walking and cycling, Shared Mobility, Traffic management, Infrastructure,Safety

ShARE Recruitment

We look for U.PORTO students, aged under 25, with 3 semesters left in Faculty

1. Online Applications

Fill in our inscription form and get ready for tough but enjoyable process! Make sure you fill every field!

10 to 23rd of February

2. Group Dynamics

This is the 2nd phase of recruitment. You will have to discuss and work with other candidates!

24 to 27th of February

3. Interview

After you're approved on the group dynamics, there's a simple interview so we can learn more about you!

2 to 6th of March

4. Final Retreat

This is the last phase! You have to make sure you are available for this very special day.

7th March 2020

Let's learn together!

Become a ShARE member this semester

Apply Now!
